类 Constant

  • java.lang.Object
    • Constant

  • public final class Constant
extends java.lang.Object
    class: store all not environmental-related data.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int KEY_LENGTH
      variable: key for user to connect to the hall server.
      private static double ONE_THOUSANTH
      constant: ONE_THOUSANTH for 0.001.
      static long REFRESH_TIME_FOR_HALL
      constant: time for hall to refresh.
      private static int TEN
      constant: TEN for 10.
      static long TIME_LIMIT_FOR_CLIENT
      constant: limit time for client connection.
      static int TIME_LIMIT_FOR_HALL
      constant: limit time for hall connection.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      private Constant()
      default constructor.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String getKey()
      function:　generate the key.
      (专用程序包) static net.sf.json.JSONObject hallServerInfo(java.lang.String password)
      function: return hall server info.
      static void log(java.lang.String log)
      function: print log information.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
